messages.content:
, anxiety and depression. I have been on medication for over 10 years now. I am currently taking sertraline and lorazepam. I also take a multivitamin, iron and calcium supplements.

i have tried therapy before but it didn't really help me. I prefer to manage my mental health through medication and self-care practices like meditation, yoga, and journaling.

my biggest challenge is dealing with the side effects of my medications. The sertraline makes me feel tired and foggy, and the lorazepam can make me feel groggy and disconnected from reality. I also experience some weight gain and sexual dysfunction as a result of these medications. It's been a struggle to find a balance between managing my symptoms and dealing with the side effects.

i have found that practicing mindfulness meditation has helped me manage my anxiety and depression. When I feel overwhelmed, I take a few deep breaths and focus on being present in the moment. This helps me calm down and gain perspective on my thoughts and feelings.

yoga has also been helpful for managing my stress levels. The physical movements help release tension in my body, and the mindfulness aspect of yoga helps me stay centered and focused.

journaling is another self-care practice that I find helpful. Writing down my thoughts and feelings allows me to process them in a healthy way, rather than bottling them up or ruminating on them. It also helps me identify patterns in my thinking and behavior that may be contributing to my mental health challenges.

overall, managing my mental health is an ongoing process. There are good days and bad days, but I try to approach each day with self-compassion and a commitment to taking care of myself. It's not always easy, but it's worth it to feel more stable and grounded in my daily life.
استرس، یک احساس رایج است که...
از اینکه حس میکنم کمبود دارم استرس میگیرم
این احساس کمبود، یک تجربه بسیار معمولی است...

متاسفم که شما استرس را تجربه می‌کنید. استرس یک احساس طبیعی است، اما اگر طولانی شود و زندگی روزمره شما را تحت تأثیر قرار دهد، ممکن است به مشکلاتی تبدیل شود.

می‌توانید درباره استرس خود صحبت کنید؟ چه چیزی باعث ایجاد استرس در شما می‌شود؟ آیا این احساس جدید است یا قبلاً تجربه کرده‌اید؟

با شنیدن داستان شما، من می‌توانم به شما کمک کنم تا راهکارهای عملی برای مدیریت استرس پیدا کنید.
